Package cinnamon.engine.utils

Provides miscellaneous interfaces and utility classes such as points and vectors.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Copier<T>
    Allows objects to copy the properties of another.
    DefinableBounds
    Declares the minimum mutators for changing a Bounds' size and position.
    LockingSpacePartitioningTree<E>
    Variant of SpacePartitioningTree mandating that Bounds in use are locked from use by any other tree instance across implementations of this interface.
    Partitionable<T extends Bounds>
    Classes implementing the Partitionable interface declares that each instance is represented in a 3D space by a simplified volume.
    Position
    Describes a location in three dimensions.
    Size
    Read-only access to width, height, and depth properties.
    SpacePartitioningTree<E>
    Organizes elements by a corresponding Bounds' location and volume to perform containment and intersection queries.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryBVH<E>
    Self-balancing binary tree implementation of a LockingSpacePartitioningTree using bounding boxes for partitioning.
    Bounds
    Defines a 3D shape with methods for testing containment and intersection against other Bounds or the spherical variant SphereBounds.
    IndexList<E>
    Array-backed list that chooses an element's index upon adding.
    IntStack
    Array-backed stack of primitive ints.
    MutableBounds
    Bounds maintaining its box shape while allowing changes to size and position.
    MutableSphereBounds
    Provides methods for changing the size and position of a SphereBounds.
    Point
    A movable point in three dimensions.
    SphereBounds
    Implementation of Bounds whose containment and intersection tests have been overridden to perform against a sphere instead of the implicit box defined by Bounds.
    Vector
    Three dimensional vector.

Package cinnamon.engine.utils Description

Provides miscellaneous interfaces and utility classes such as points and vectors.
